snippet: The anxiety and the promise of revamping the health insurance system have left thousands of people in North Carolina struggling to sort out their options.
abstract: Politically mixed state of North Carolina may be best place to look for a measure of the tumult that has accompanied the arrival of the federal health care overhaul, as change has left hundreds of thousands of people struggling to sort out their options; many will end up with better coverage, while others will see their costs rise and wonder if change is worth it

byline.original: By JOHN SCHWARTZ and KATIE THOMAS

lead_paragraph: The anxiety and the promise of revamping the health insurance system have left thousands of people in North Carolina struggling to sort out their options.

headline.main: Health Care Law Providing Relief and Frustration
headline.print_headline: Health Care Law Providing Relief and Frustration

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
